DOC.brief_summary: To determine intensive cardiac rehabilitation program periodic reinforcement improve compliance/adherence secondary preventive measure ( physical exercise , mediterranean diet , tobacco abstinence , pharmacological treatment ) acute coronary syndrome without ST segment elevation versus standard cardiac rehabilitation program
DOC.brief_title: More Intensive Cardiac Rehabilitation Programs Less Time
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Equal old 18 year old Acute coronary syndrome without ST elevation within last two month Being able physical exercise Being able understand educative session Being able understand patient information consent form Hemodynamic instability Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < = 35 % Heart failure class III IV ( New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Functional Classification ) Refractory angina Any pathology physical exercise indicate
DOC.keyword: More intensive cardiac rehabilitation program less time
